pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, January 28, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario                            

Private meetings.

Media Appearance

1:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CTV’s The Social. The Prime Minister will participate in a conversation about mental health with co-hosts Melissa Grelo, Cynthia Loyst, Lainey Lui, and correspondent Jessica Allen.
